title: Who thinks there should be a in game command report? /report
body: Hi im sure many players have been trolled in the champ lock in and also have been penalized wrongfully . So im highly just suggesting the command in game called /report just like /surrender but you nominate a team member to be reported and if four team members or plus vote yes then riot should penalized that player! Simple enough right? just a new command just like /surrender but /report

replies.body: Something like that would most likely only be used by negative people ganging up on others. There are just waaaaay too many ways something like that could be negatively abused.

Don't think it's a good idea.
People in the heat of the moment would punish someone for just making a mistake or having a bad game.
